Posts.Content: Page1989 wrote: I am starting Abraxane and Avastin every two weeks for six months on Jan 12, 2010.  Has anyone had experience with these two drugs?  I've had AC, Taxotere, Femara, Faslodex, Xeloda - - all failed to stop my mets to my armpit lymph nodes.  Any advice?  Any nausea or vomiting?   Hair loss? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Abraxane and Avastin Page1989 NOTaStatistic

Posts.Content: Page1989 wrote: Has anyone taken Xeloda?  I have to start on three pills, twice a day.  I failed Femara and Faslodex, so my onc. is trying chemo again.  Originally I had neoadjuvant chemo with A/C four courses, Taxol seven courses, then a double mastectomy without reconstruction, 32 rad treatments, Femara, Faslodex, and finally recurrence in two lymph nodes on my opposite side armpit one year later.  Now it's the Xeloda.   Any experiences, advice, etc?
